extendedInfo.description: CFA Level 1 Financial Statements updated for 2013 Syllabus.Provide on-the-go learning for all CFA Level 1 candidates.All CFA Level 1 Financial Statements topics covered:1) Accrual Concepts2) EPS3) Statement of Cash Flow4) Analysis of Financial Statement5) Analysis of Inventory6) Long Term Assets7) Analysis of Income Taxes8) Long Term LiabilitiesTailor-made for the June 2013 CFA 1 Exam.

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: It needs to be improved more as size of words can not be enlarged. For my 4.7 inch phone, it is too small to read... If this problem can be fixed, i\'d purchase other apps. Thx for this free.
reviews.author: UYEN THI PHAM
